title: FPS
body:
Hey guys,

I've been having some troubles with the game for a bit now due to fps. I played maybe 10 games in a day, my fps fine, and then all of a sudden I join a match and I have 1-5 fps from 60fps on max graphics. Changed the graphics settings, Updated all the drivers, got rid of unwanted junk from the computer etc etc and nothing changes please help.

replies.body:
Hey **Krosis**,
Could you please list your computer specifications, be sure to include the following information:

* -Processor
* -Graphics Card
* -RAM Installed

Before anything though, have you recently made any changes to your computer? _I.e downloaded any programs, added or removed any hardware?_ These changes sometimes have other effects on software and hardware already installed.

Be sure to check your processes using task manager (CTRL + ALT + DEL), ensure that there are no background processes stealing your resources.


EDIT: If you have no prior knowledge about Task Manager, maybe read up on it before stopping processes and services.
Ensure that it's not another program, anti virus program or hardware/software conflict first.
Cheers.

Heya,
Processor: Intel core i7 3990 CPU
Graphics card: nVidia GeForce 660 GTX
Ram: 16gb
Ive checked my processes and none of them are stealing anything. I know somewhat regarding CPU usage and all that jazz so that was the first thing i checked. Ive also checked the internet regarding this problem and no one else has had it.
Thanks

Also,
Ive noticed that the game during this time (As it still happens) Changes my key bindings all together. Not letting me left click, ESC etc etc. I can't even try to reconnect or anything. It just changes the whole game. I have no idea what happened. I also havent removed any hardware or installed anything new
